generated_body: In this article, the reader can expect a discussion on the ongoing impeachment hearings related to the Biden family, with a focus on the perspective of House Democrats. The piece may outline the claim that the investigation into the Bidens is considered a "sham" by some Democratic leaders, suggesting that they believe it lacks legitimacy and will not significantly influence the impeachment process. Additionally, it could provide context about the broader political implications and strategies surrounding the impeachment proceedings, particularly in relation to public opinion and party dynamics.
